title.narrative: 1.1: SOCIAL PROTECTION SYSTEMS

description.narrative: Output 1: Social protection systems to provide appropriate responses to the needs of poor and vulnerable children are strengthened., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Access To Inclusive Social Protection (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Social inclusion and dataBy 2022, poor and vulnerable children are better identified and increasingly benefit from child- sensitive and integrated social protection systems and child-responsive national policies and public spending.

participating-org.narrative: THE OXFORD POVERTY AND HUMAN DEVELO OPHI

mailing-address.narrative: 87 Misr Helwan Agricultural Road Maadi Cairo

sector.narrative: Expanding and improving cash transfers for children

Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
UNICEF-funded humanitarian cash transfers and/or vouchers (through mixed and parallel systems)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 1: Social protection systems to provide appropriate responses to the needs of poor and vulnerable children are strengthened.

description.narrative: UNICEF continues to support the government of Egypt in addressing the high poverty and vulnerability through technical support to support the expansion of social assistance and linkages to other;service, in addition to social protection for informal workers and covid-19 policy coordination.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/12/2021
